title: Post Game: Ruth Marcus on the ‘inability’ for immigration to be seen as a positive story
description: Ruth Marcus, deputy editorial page editor for the Washington Post, joins Chuck to talk about President Biden’s economic challenges and the upcoming Title 42 backlash.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
